tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_plans (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE design_specifications (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name VARCHAR(255),
    design_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ProjectPlans (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
project_name VARCHAR(255),
project_description TEXT,
project_owner VARCHAR(100),
created_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE DesignSpecifications (design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
design_name VARCHAR(255),
design_description TEXT,
designer_name VARCHAR(100),
design_created_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(100),
email VARCHAR(255),
user_role VARCHAR(50),
join_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE ProjectProgress (progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
project_id INT,
progress_status VARCHAR(50),
progress_notes TEXT,
last_updated_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE design_specifications (
    spec_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    spec_name VARCHAR(255),
    spec_description TEXT,
    spec_file BYTEA,
    created_date DATE
);
